mxCell.value: Async Replication - S3, Native Aurora Global replication, Redis Global

Assumptions: 
1. Orders in S3 data is already captured or available

%3CmxGraphModel%3E%3Croot%3E%3CmxCell%20id%3D%220%22%2F%3E%3CmxCell%20id%3D%221%22%20parent%3D%220%22%2F%3E%3CmxCell%20id%3D%222%22%20parent%3D%221%22%20style%3D%22text%3Bhtml%3D1%3BwhiteSpace%3Dwrap%3BstrokeColor%3Dnone%3BfillColor%3Dnone%3Balign%3Dcenter%3BverticalAlign%3Dmiddle%3Brounded%3D0%3B%22%20value%3D%22sorted%20pricing%20by%20symbol%22%20vertex%3D%221%22%3E%3CmxGeometry%20height%3D%2230%22%20width%3D%2260%22%20x%3D%22465%22%20y%3D%22417.5%22%20as%3D%22geometry%22%2F%3E%3C%2FmxCell%3E%3C%2Froot%3E%3C%2FmxGraphModel%3Es
3. Possibility to use AWS Local Zone setup, had been deferred for now, pending clarification
Oder file is dropped in AWS S3
SNS event is triggered and routes to SQS
SQS message is consuded by consuer by one the consumer in Multi-AZ
Data file is. read by consumer
Order event is send to another SQS
Order event is consumed by lambda function
Redis cache is updated, order matching is established
Ordered are pushed to existing SQS for persistence are consumed by component , after that it flow standard flow
Redis store is updated and request is order is matched or prices is calculated and response send to caller
Messages are send to SQS, could have used MSK as well to persist it into database
Requests load balances to one of the order/matching service
Order details are persisted into database
Messages are consumed and all necessary processing are done
